for all those curious how they are going to play against {{champion:157}} this week, I will give you guys some tips. Item wise, Yasuo's biggest item counter would probably a {{item:3110}} (reduces attack speed. The less attack speed, the less Steel Tempest[Q]). And best summoner spell counter would be {{summoner:3}} (again less attack speed, less [Q's] he will be able to put out). Biggest Champion Middle lane counter is {{champion:10}} or {{champion:84}}. For going against Yasuo Top lane, your counters would be {{champion:24}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:114}} or {{champion:92}}. Hope i helped you all on having a positive fun game where your sad cause of your score :D
kayle counters almost everyone who does damage XD

So I know he's not super popular, but after a few matches with Malzahar{{champion:90}} I've decided he is highly effective. He has enough poke, and his ult locks down yasou, which is the thing he hates the most. Also, QWE are not blocked by windwall(not sure about R).
